EMERGENCY COMMISSIONS

I'm opening this emergency commission to help with urgent bills that are near due. My minimum wage job is not helping me enough and I need to help fund both me and my sibling's university fees. This commission will remain open until further notice.


Disclaimer

This type of work leans more towards 'composition' rather than 'classic animation' where each frame is drawn by hand. In essence, these works consist of animation of existing static images, composited with various VFX (glows, lens flare, energy blasts, laser shots, fractals, glitches, etc.). A great example is to see the VFX Gallery, on the Blobs category.

TL;DR I'm a VFX artist, not a conventional artist; I don't draw, but composite images with VFX elements made from scratch


Terms

The contents used to make the product, or the finished product itself must abide to these following rules:

  1. No NSFW, R18+ and gore
  2. No racism, politics, extremist, cyberbullying, or any other sensitive topics
  3. Should not contain copyrighted material


Start commissioning here

  1. Fill in this form:
  2. Contact me through either my business email (forgeworkseven@gmail.com) or through Discord (username: StahlFerro#0055) If no response from you is seen 72 hours after the form is sent, the commission is invalidated
  3. Provide the static images that you want animated. If you don't have or need me to draw them, then I'm afraid you need to seek digital animators instead. Vector images can be made if you don't have them.
  4. During the process, preview images are made for you to see before the final product is made. These cannot be shared for others to see. You can keep/modify it to yourself however.
  5. Before the finished final product is delivered to you, payment must be completed through Paypal. Follow the guide below.


Payment guide

  1. All payments are made through Paypal (USD$)
